overview:
Abhineet heads Technology at NoiseStreet, an interactive out-of-home media startup based out of Singapore .

At NoiseStreet, Abhineet is responsible for product strategy, product development and developer relationships. Abhineet manages the development of the NoiseStreet infrastructure and APIs, scaling etc .

Before NoiseStreet, Abhineet worked with Gemalto, Singapore .He was in charge of developing smart card based systems as per evolving telecommunication ecosystem for major telco clients. Abhineet has been a pioneer on NFC and does extensive research in the same field . Abhineet has done extensive research on how NFC would impact the world - in terms of bridging the online and offline - especially by adding interactivity and engagement to static Out-of-home media.
